title: "Somebody Killed My Best Friend!" | Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: It's okay Crowley, he's only been discorporated...
Can we all appreciate that Crowley said “for heaven’s sake” for Aziraphale?
I was totally not expecting Aziraphale to curse but it was genuinely surprising and hilarious
Just realized the reference from Crowley snapping his fingers to open the door of the bookshop, since it's the same way the TARDIS doors open.

1:00 "Seducing women to do your evil will!"
"I think perhaps you have the wrong shop."

How has no one mentioned this part...?
description:
After Aziraphale is 'exorcised' by Shadwell, Crowley is left missing his best friend in the remains of his burning bookshop.
» SUBSCRIBE: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwSIJ...
